distro.name: Slackware
distro.description: Once you Slack you'll never go back

advantages.advantage: This is one of the first distributions of Linux to be released
It is one of the fastest-running systems you can get (barring Gentoo of course)
It has a very loyal following

disadvantages.disadvantage: Due to the simplicity of the distro, it requires you to know how to set up a linux machine - nothing is automated
It is harder to keep up-to-date than systems like Gentoo or Debian or even Redhat
